From tasting exciting new foods to immersing yourselves in Vietnamese culture and witnessing glorious natural wonders, your journey will be filled with discoveries. View more View less 11 nights + 12 day tour from $ 2400 per person family share (based on a family of 4). Flights are additional Enquire now Sale Period : until sold out Deal Includes: 11 Nights Meals as specified (drinks are not included) English speaking local guides Tours and transfers as specified by private air-conditioned vehicles Hanoi Jeep Tour Ha Long Bay boat trip with meals Phong Nha Cave Tour Hue City tour Hoi An cycle & cooking tour Travel Dates & Pricing Select Departure Dates between 01 Nov 25 - 21 Dec 25, 03 Jan-13 Feb & 23 Feb-31 Aug 26 from $2400 per person family share Ask us about upgrading to 5 Star accommodation options International flights are additional Itinerary Day 1: Arrival day in Hanoi Welcome to Hanoi. You will be transferred from the airport to your comfy hotel where you will have free time to check-in, relax and/or explore the city and its many wonders. Day 2: Hanoi Day Tour by Jeep Embark on a captivating half-day jeep tour in Hanoi, immersing yourself in the daily life of the city as you witness the maze of backstreets, tiny alleyways, schools, and markets, gaining insights into how Hanoians truly live, work, and play. (B) Day 3: Ha Long & Lan Ha Bay Cruise After a 2.5 hour journey you will board your Ha Long Bay cruise boat. Devour a delicious lunch while cruising through some of the thousands of limestone karsts. Swim in the bay’s emerald waters, explore caves with incredible formations and spend the night enjoying the tranquillity of Ha Long Bay. (B,L,D) Day 4: Ha Long Bay to Phong Nha Enjoy a morning of Tai Chi, light breakfast and further exploration before enjoying your lunch on the way back to the harbour. You will then be transferred to the Hanoi train station to catch your overnight train to Dong Hoi. Each cabin has 4 sleeper berths. (flight options available at additional cost) (B, L) Day 5: Phong Nha Cave Tour Your driver will meet you at the train station and transfer you to Phong Nha. Experience the adventure of a lifetime, exploring the cave’s beautiful stalactites and stalagmites. The Dark Cave offers further adventure with activities like zip-lining, kayaking, swimming, and mud bathing. The Duck Stop adds a cultural touch with opportunities to interact with ducks and learn about local life. (B) Day 6 : Phong Nha to Hue After breakfast you will enjoy a relaxing private car ride to Hue. Check-in to your hotel and rest or start exploring your new destination, the choice is yours. (B) Day 7: Hue Motorbike Tour After breakfast you will be introduced to our highly skilled and qualified drivers for a safety briefing. You will then ride through little laneways, alongside canals and through local markets, visit a king’s tomb, pagoda and local handicrafts. You will see Hue’s Citadel and forbidden Purple City & learn about Vietnam’s emperors and histories. Lunch is a delicious traditional Buddhist banquet served at a pagoda. (B, L) Day 8: Hai Van Pass to Hoi An After breakfast you will drive south to Hoi An. You will drive over the spectacular Hai Van Pass, which is considered to be one of the most beautiful routes to drive in Vietnam. Travel through the outer suburbs of Da Nang before making a stop to visit Marble mountain and on to Hoi An. (B) Day 9 & 10: Hoi An Free Day You have the next 2 day to relax, enjoy and explore. For extra activities like the Golden Hand Bridge, Vinpearl Waterpark, lantern making workshops and cultural shows, ask your House of Travel Consultant. (B) Day 11: Hoi An Cycle & Cooking Class Start your tour with a leisurely cycle along the Thu Bon River, exploring a fishing village, rice fields, and palm forests. Enjoy a boat trip in the water coconut forest, visit Tra Que vegetable village for a sustainable farming experience, including a cooking class and lunch. (B, L) Day 12: Departure Day Your family holiday has come to a close. We will transfer you to the airport for your return home... or you can contact your House Of Travel agent to extend your holiday.
